response_strategy: Reframe around value: models start at $150, free sample eliminates risk. Compare to traditional model shop costs ($500-2000+) and in-house time investment. For larger orders, offer volume pricing.
key_points: Models start at $150 for basic FDM
Free sample print — zero risk evaluation
60-80% cheaper than traditional model shops
Time savings = designer hours freed for billable work

response_strategy: Position as complement, not replacement. In-house FDM is great for quick studies, but SLA/SLS produces client-facing quality. Offer for specific use cases: competition models, client presentations, investor meetings.
key_points: Complement in-house FDM with SLA/SLS for detail work
Client-facing models need higher quality than study models
No maintenance, material, or operator costs for occasional high-detail jobs
Focus on competition and presentation models

response_strategy: Acknowledge timing. Plant seed for future: most firms start with one project. Offer to stay in touch and share portfolio for when the right project comes up. No pressure.
key_points: Respect the timing — no pushiness
Most clients start with single test project
Competition models are common entry point
Offer to send portfolio for future reference

response_strategy: Lead with proof: free sample of their actual design. Mention SLA layer height (50 microns), professional finishing process, and QC inspection. Offer references from similar firms.
key_points: Free sample of THEIR design — proof in their hands
50-micron layer height (SLA) — finer than human hair
Professional finishing: sanding, priming, painting
QC inspection on every order

response_strategy: Guarantee 48-hour standard turnaround. Rush service available for 24-hour. Share examples of competition deadline deliveries. Offer guaranteed delivery date at quote stage.
key_points: 48-hour standard guaranteed turnaround
24-hour rush for competition deadlines
Delivery date locked at quote stage
Express shipping included on rush orders
